Title: Gemini 3 Pro is in public preview for GitHub Copilot
EnhancedContent:
Gemini 3 Pro, Google’s latest frontier model, is now rolling out and will be available in [GitHub Copilot Pro, Pro+ Business, and Enterprise](https://github.com/features/copilot/plans) subscriptions. Rollout will be gradual. Check back soon if you don’t see it yet.

**How it works**

You’ll be able to select the model in the Copilot Chat model picker from:

- VS Code in Agent, Plan, Ask, and Edit mode
- github.com
- GitHub Mobile iOS and Android
- GitHub CLI

### **Enabling access**

- **Enterprise and Business plans**: Administrators must enable the Gemini 3 Pro policy in Copilot settings. Once enabled, users in that organization will see Gemini 3 Pro in supported surfaces.
- **Pro and Pro+ plans**: Enable by selecting the model in the Visual Studio Code picker and confirming the one-time prompt.
- **Bring your own key**: Select **Manage Models** from the picker, choose Gemini 3 Pro, and enter your API key when prompted.

### **Learn more and share feedback**

To explore all models available in GitHub Copilot, see our [documentation](https://docs.github.com/copilot/reference/ai-models/supported-models).

Join the [GitHub Community](https://github.com/orgs/community/discussions/categories/copilot-conversations) to share your feedback.

Author: Allison
